name: IP_ORDER_REC
description: This table contains Inpatient order reconciliation information.

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the event record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TAKING_BEF_ADM_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether a medication was taken within 24 hours of admission.

columns.name: ORDREC_SORT_POC_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the Phase of Care that indicates when this action should take place.

columns.name: IP_ORDREC_REV_HRS
columns.description: The number of hours after a completed transfer event that the review not needed status for One Step Order Reconciliation orders is valid.

columns.name: IP_ORDREC_REV_EXP_DTTM
columns.description: The time at which the review not needed status for One Step Order Reconciliation orders expires.

columns.name: DISCONTINUE_NOTE
columns.description: If the reconciliation action (I IEV 1020) indicates a discontinue, this item indicates the note for discontinuation (if one was specified by the user).

columns.name: ORDER_REC_HOLD_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The provider hold action (hold or unhold) for this action line, if applicable.

columns.name: HOLD_INFO_LINE_NUMBER
columns.description: The line number in the order record that contains additional hold information for this order reconciliation action, if applicable. The values in this column can be linked to the LINE column in the ORDER_HOLD_INFO table.
